section.name: What is the Apache Mailet API?
section.p: The Apache Mailet API is a Java API which allows the rapid development and flexible deployment of email processing functionality.
The Mailet API is a subproject of Apache JAMES. All who are interested in developing the Mailet API and JAMES will be warmly welcomed on the mailing lists.

section.name: Getting Started
section.p: Until these pages are fleshed out, the best way to understand the API is to read the Javadocs and look at the source code.

subsection.name: Building the Mailet API
subsection.p: The build uses Ant. ant -projecthelp describes appropriate targets. ant runs the default target.

section.name: Comments, Questions and Issues
section.p: Please direct your feedback to the mailet-api mailing list.
